Posted By: Flyheight (4/23/2013 3:43:51 PM)

posts.post_content:
So many commenters just completely disregard the fact that limited is a legitimate and popular format, where many non-constructed worthy cards have a solid place.  
  
This is one such card - it's only viable in some casual decks in constructed, but in limited, it's an anthem affect at uncommon, on a creature with evasion and a high enough toughness that it often won't be able to be blocked effectively. Creatures are a huge part of limited, so being able to get a usually non-creature effect (anthem) on a creature is just gravy.  
  
At 5 mana it's not an auto-pick, but when you have them you'll be happy to play them in most cases.
posts.html:
So many commenters just completely disregard the fact that limited is a legitimate and popular format, where many non-constructed worthy cards have a solid place.

This is one such card - it's only viable in some casual decks in constructed, but in limited, it's an anthem affect at uncommon, on a creature with evasion and a high enough toughness that it often won't be able to be blocked effectively. Creatures are a huge part of limited, so being able to get a usually non-creature effect (anthem) on a creature is just gravy.

At 5 mana it's not an auto-pick, but when you have them you'll be happy to play them in most cases.
